job title: Summer College Intern - IT Data Science
job description:
Requisition ID: 27676

NextEra Energy Resources is one of the largest wholesale generators of electric power and renewable energy from the wind and sun in North America.

Position Specific Description

Responsible for the development and integration in a Hadoop environment of new or existing applications into the technical infrastructure and existing business processes. Provides technical or functional guidance to project and work teams as needed within a specific discipline. Collaborates on an on-going basis with the Business Systems Analyst. Analyzes, Designs, builds, installs, configures and supports a Hadoop environment. Maintains and/or enhances existing or new systems and creates documentation that is reliable and efficient.

Required Qualifications: High School Graduate/ College or University student working toward bachelor's degree in: Computer Science, Information Technology or Mathematics

Must have completed course work in database design/ structure as well as basic analytics.

Preferred Qualifications: Analytical Problem Solving, Report Development, Good Listening Skills, Team Player, Effective Written Communications, Effective Verbal Communications, Analysis, Strategic Planning, SQL, Familiarity with Microsoft Office Suite (especially excel), Database Structure, Web Technologies, Information Coding Standards, Programming using any or all of the following: C#, C++, Java, JSN, HTML, Python, Spring boot, shell scripting.

Qualifications that are a Plus: Knowledge of Agile Methodologies, Hadoop Administration, development in Kafka, Spark, Hive, HBase, Data Modeling, Microsoft Business Intelligence Suite of products.

Job Overview

Employees in the role will be provided mentoring and practical hands on experience for relevant career-related activities encountered in the student's area of study or specialization. To be considered for this position the applicant must be actively enrolled at a college or university as a full-time student seeking a bachelor's degree or higher. Candidate must also have a current GPA of 3.00 or higher (on a 0.00 to 4.00 scale).

Job Duties&Responsibilities
  • Assists department with assigned projects
  • Completes challenging projects and assignments
  • Presents final project to senior leadership at the end of the internship
  • Performs other job-related duties as assigned
Required Qualifications
  • High School Grad / GED
Preferred Qualifications
  • Effective Written Communications
  • Effective Verbal Communications
